gamerule.disableBiomeFreezeIce: Disable water freezing due to biome temperature
gamerule.disableBiomeFreezeIce.descripti: If true, water placed in the world will not freze by natural means, either biome, temperature, or elevation
gamerule.disableBlockGravity: Disable blocks falling from gravity (sand, gravel, ...)
gamerule.disableBlockGravity.description: Disable blocks falling from gravity (sand, gravel, ...)
gamerule.disableHunger: Disable hunger, meaning players are always full and hunger bar not visible
gamerule.disableHunger.description: Disable hunger, meaning players are always full and hunger bar not visible
gamerule.disableLightMeltIce: Disable ice melting from things like light levels
gamerule.disableLightMeltIce.description: Disable ice melting from things like light levels
gamerule.disableMobItemPickup: Disable item pickup when any Mob joins the world
gamerule.disableMobItemPickup.descriptio: Disable item pickup when any Mob joins the world
gamerule.disablePetFriendlyFire: Disable pet friendly fire (harming own tamed pets/horses)
gamerule.disablePetFriendlyFire.descript: Disable pet friendly fire (harming own tamed pets/horses)
gamerule.disableTargetingPlayers: Disable mobs from targeting players; no spawning changes; any difficulty
gamerule.disableTargetingPlayers.descrip: Disable mobs from targeting players; no spawning changes; any difficulty
gamerule.disableLightningTransform: Disable mobs from transforming when struck by lightning
gamerule.disableLightningTransform.descr: Disable mobs from transforming when struck by lightning
gamerule.disablePortalCreationNether: Disable players from igniting nether portals
gamerule.disablePortalCreationNether.des: Disable players from igniting nether portals
gamerule.disablePortalCreationEnd: Disable players from igniting end portals
gamerule.disablePortalCreationEnd.descri: Disable players from igniting end portals
gamerule.doArmorStandWeapons: Allow equipping armor stand main & offhand
gamerule.doArmorStandWeapons.description: Allow equipping armor stand main & offhand
gamerule.doMapsAlwaysUpdate: Update maps from inventory even if not held by player
gamerule.doMapsAlwaysUpdate.description: Update maps from inventory even if not held by player
gamerule.doEyesAlwaysBreak: Ender Eyes always break when thrown
gamerule.doEyesAlwaysBreak.description: Ender Eyes always break when thrown
gamerule.doInstantEating: Ender Eyes always break when thrown
gamerule.doInstantEating.description: Ender Eyes always break when thrown
gamerule.doLilypadsBreak: Lily Pads break when player falls on them, preventing damage
gamerule.doLilypadsBreak.description: Lily Pads break when player falls on them, preventing damage
gamerule.doFriendlyIronGolems: Iron golems are always friendly to players
gamerule.doFriendlyIronGolems.descriptio: Iron golems are always friendly to players
